subject: Horses
Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: The Breeders’ Cup will feature the world’s top horses — and more than a few trainers with multiple and serious drug violations involving horses in their past.
snippet: The Breeders’ Cup will feature the world’s top horses — and more than a few trainers with multiple and serious drug violations involving horses in their past.
